name: Tired Zombie
description:
Entry for KennyJam 2019

Theme: Unlikely combinations

Help little zombie to get his home back from evil ghosts.

Credits/Attributions:

This game uses the following sounds

  • Zombie_22 by LittleRobotSoundFactory (https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/316217/)
  • SAD_GHOST_04 by MATTIX (https://freesound.org/people/MATTIX/sounds/448751/)
  • teleport by Sergenious (https://freesound.org/people/Sergenious/sounds/55853/
  • Undead Anguish by DNAudio_UK (https://freesound.org/people/DNAudio_UK/sounds/414898/)
